TopicTitle: The good, the bad, and the blurry from the event

Articles.Content:
What were your impressions from the pre release videos

 

Good. Overall the look of painted rockets. Ui seems almost perfect

 

Bad. No auto struts. The performance hit at high part counts.saves seemed to randomly pick up odd artifacts .

 

The blurry. And no this is not exactly referring to videos that blurred out some things like a rock and/ or anomaly s *. Hopefully there's a optional way to turn down some of the paint shine. Water waves  on landing seems to be a bit exaggerated but they may turn that down. Also a couple of videos had a few too many "oh I need to show you what I'm doing with a hand held camera" cuts.  To be fair some of it was ok,  and ones showing who was around them was fine. 

 

*To be fair, speculating what those blurs could be will be fun. Although one we know was apparently a rock ( asteroid?  ) of some kind just from a audio comment in the background. I don't think anyone got close to one of the arches.
